description:
* WELCOME! * Cozy 2 room Studio/Suite Located In The Quiet Residential Fort hill Neighborhood, nestled on a private way in a Historic Victorian Brick Row House, Circa 1860. Easy access to City Attractions!

As a proud partner and supporter of Airbnb Open Homes and their affiliates, we make this listing available to families in need of a place to stay when visiting local hospitals.

Perfect **Sunny** 2 Room Studio/Suite
